attributes.action: Ban imports from any country which executes children, homosexuals or adulterers, and any country that stones people to death.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: several islamic countries execute homosexuals, adulterers, and apostates. Iran in particular executes people by stoning them to death, and has hung 15 and 16 year olds in the last few years.
